objects.text:
• 100% Pure, Farm-Fresh Whole Milk
• Glass Bottle Packaging - Preserves Natural Taste
• No Artificial Hormones or Preservatives
• Rich in Essential Nutrients: Calcium, Vitamin D & Protein

product_details.name: Farm Fresh Dairy Bundle: Premium Natural Milk Collection
product_details.description:
• 100% Pure, Farm-Fresh Whole Milk
• Glass Bottle Packaging - Eco-friendly & Preserves Natural Taste
• No Artificial Hormones or Preservatives
• Available in Various Sizes: 1L Bottle & 500ml Pitcher
• Rich in Essential Nutrients: Calcium, Vitamin D, and Protein
• Locally Sourced from Premium Dairy Farms
• Perfect for Families - Multiple Serving Options
• Freshness Guaranteed - Sealed for Maximum Quality
• Classic Blue-Tinted Glass Design
• Ideal for Cooking, Baking, and Direct Consumption

banner_details:
The banner features a clean and modern layout promoting a dairy product with a bright and fresh feel. The background is made up of a gentle diagonal gradient composed of soft blue hues, with semi-transparent circular and dotted design elements adding depth and polish. At the top, the bold brand title (`heading`) in dark blue commands attention, followed by a softer-toned subtitle (`subheading`) that describes the nature of the milk collection. Positioned underneath is an orange tagline (`tagline`) that generates excitement. The focal point is a centered product image (`product_image`) of milk bottles and glasses. A concise list of benefits (`description`) is presented below. Discount text (`discount_text`) stands out in orange. Pricing (`price`) is large and bold just above a blue rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_button`) with engaging white text (`cta_text`) urging users to order.

**Color Palette:**
- Sky Blue: #D0E8F9
- Soft Blue Gradient: #E6F4FD → #D0E8F9
- Accent Blue: #1E5C8B
- Highlight Orange: #FF8C00
- Light Blue Text: #4A9AD3
- Button White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases milk in glass containers, emphasizing purity and freshness through a minimalist and clean color palette. Dominant colors include milky white (#FDFDFB) representing purity and health, and translucent glass shades with subtle blue tints (#B9D9EB) that evoke coolness and cleanliness. The glass edges have a soft blue hue (#A2C3DD), subtly blending with white, while light reflections in the glass add a touch of soft gray (#D4D4D4). These colors blend harmoniously while maintaining contrast through highlights and shades. For an advertisement banner, using a palette of white, light blue, and soft gray will enhance the freshness and clarity of the product.
